name: Rush Boxing
description:
Rush Boxing delivers a retro arcade boxing game for your iPhone & iPad. The Intuitive sports mode touch & gamepad control options make it easy to throw bone crushing punches at your opponent!

You will travel around the world to face 9 of the toughest boxers on the planet. Not only will you have to use speed and power, but you will also have to master the art of the sweet science, that is boxing and become a star.

If you manage to defeat all 9 opponents you will be crowned Rush Boxing Champion and leave an eternal legacy that may never again be matched.

Punch to the head, body and knockout your opponent, to become a Boxing Star.

FEATURES:
- Fast & Rewarding Gameplay.
- Game Center Leaderboards.
- Retro Pixel Art Graphics.
- Arcade Style Soundtrack.
